name: Widely Blindly
description:
participation in the narrative driven jam completed in 5 days.

available in : Hungarian, Serbian and English

CONTROLS:

  • ACCEPT - Left click or Y
  • DECLINE - Right click or N
  • MOUSE - Look around

STORY:

The player has to guide Feysin, the main character through 7 days, and see the world Feysin lives in. Artificial Intelligence took role of humans, and humans are only there to train AI. Feysin wants to stop this.
